SoftwareType.Name: Operating System
SoftwareType.Description: The Operating System is the largest piece of software in Software Inc. Most software needs an Operating System to run on. When people stop buying a line of Operating Systems, they will also stop buying software for them.

Category.Name: Home OS
Category.Description: Home Computer designed to keep your kids busy doing their non-existent homework.

Category.Name: Office OS
Category.Description: Everyone needs a computer at work to dodge their boss.

Category.Name: Office Phone OS
Category.Description: How do you expect your conference calls to go through?

Category.Name: Cell Phone OS
Category.Description: A small but useable OS for phone users in the 90s.

Category.Name: Gaming OS
Category.Description: What did you think? Your High-scores were just in a cloud some where?
